name: Dead or Alive 6: Strongest Package - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Dead or Alive 6
- Official Book
- Official Soundtrack CD
- Special Can Badges set (25 pieces)
- DLC Set
- Dakimakura Cover (Ayane & Kasumi)
- Special 3D Mouse Pad (Honoka)
- Special 3D Mouse Pad (Marie)
- Special 3D Mouse Pad (New character)
- Bathroom Poster (5 sets)
